svg.text: Send Notifications Use Case
Use Case Specification
Use Case Name:
Send Notifications
Actor(s):
System
Description:
Automated system process for generating and delivering notifications to users
based on user activities, achievements, match events, and social interactions.
Preconditions:
1. System must detect notification-triggering events
2. Target users must have active accounts with notification preferences
Main Flow:
1. System detects notification-triggering event (XP gain, achievement, match update)
2. System identifies target users based on event type and relationships
3. System generates notification content with appropriate messaging
4. System checks user notification preferences and settings
5. System creates notification record in database with timestamp
6. System delivers notification to user's notification panel
7. System updates notification count badge for target users
8. System logs notification delivery for tracking and analytics
9. System handles notification batching for multiple simultaneous events
10. System manages notification retention and cleanup policies
Alternative Flows:
A1. User preferences disabled: System respects opt-out settings for notification types
A2. Batch notifications: System groups similar notifications to prevent spam
A3. Priority notifications: System handles urgent notifications with higher priority
A4. Delivery failure: System retries notification delivery with fallback methods
A5. Rate limiting: System prevents excessive notifications to single users
